model.name: threads
model.title: Threads
model.description: Specifies that all steps after this node are processed asynchronously
model.label: eip,routing

executorServiceRef.description: To refer to a custom thread pool or use a thread pool profile (as overlay)

keepAliveTime.description: Sets the keep alive time for idle threads

timeUnit.description: Sets the keep alive time unit. By default SECONDS is used.

maxQueueSize.description: Sets the maximum number of tasks in the work queue. Use -1 or Integer.MAX_VALUE for an unbounded queue

allowCoreThreadTimeOut.description: Whether idle core threads is allowed to timeout and therefore can shrink the pool size below the core pool size Is by default false

threadName.description: Sets the thread name to use.

rejectedPolicy.description: Sets the handler for tasks which cannot be executed by the thread pool.

callerRunsWhenRejected.description: Whether or not to use as caller runs as fallback when a task is rejected being added to the thread pool (when its full). This is only used as fallback if no rejectedPolicy has been configured, or the thread pool has no configured rejection handler. Is by default true

id.description: Sets the id of this node

description.description: Sets the description of this node
